channel.title: General Electric Company (R-033)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Forwards revised pages to radiological emergency plan, reflecting minor changes in organization clarification of designation of emergency operations coordinator & consolidation of communications at central alarm station.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO.

item.title: Insp repts 50-018/96-01,50-070/96-01,50-073/96-01 & 50-183/96-01 on 960311-15.No violations noted.Major areas inspected:organization & mgt controls,qualifications & training,special nuclear matl & accountability & more.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Forwards insp rept 50-018/96-01,50-070/96-01,50-073/96-01 & 50-183/96-01 on 960311-15.No violations noted.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Physical Protection Insp Repts 50-070/79-03 & 50-073/79-02 on 791107-09.Deviation noted:noncompliance w/Reg Guide 5.12, "General Use of Locks in the Protection & Control of Facilities & Nuclear Matls." Portions withheld.

item.title: Notice of deviation from insp on 791107-09.Portions deleted.

item.title: Physical Security Insp Repts 50-070/81-01 & 50-073/81-73 on 810406-07.No noncompliance noted.Major areas inspected: security plan,protection of SNM,security organization,access control,alarm sys & keys.Portions deleted.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, MANUFACTURER/VENDOR/ENGINEER, INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS

item.title: Further response to FOIA request for physical security & safeguards insp repts for nonpower reactors in Regions II & V from 1979 to present.Portions of documents in app withheld (ref FOIA Exemption 4).

item.title: Forwards GE 920318 Mfg Hanover Amend to Ltr of Credit & Trust Agreement Schedule A,reflecting increased in sum by stated amount w/expiration date extended to 930323,per terms & conditions of Ltr of Credit.
